metadata.title: CVE-2023-38409 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in set_con2fb_map indrivers/video/fbdev/core/fbcon.c in the Linux kernel before 6.2.12. Becausean assignment occurs only for the first vc, the fbcon_registered_fb andfbcon_display arrays can be desynchronized in fbcon_mode_deleted (thecon2fb_map points at the old fb_info).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
